Warren has expressed support for sex: reassignment therapy to be covered under taxpayer-funded programs such as Medicaid, Medicare, and Tricare, as well as state Medicaid programs.
A controversial article: s headline on the subject was misleading, giving the impression that Warren had said, word-for-word, "taxpayers must fund sex reassignment surgery" and that she proposed funding all sex-reassignment surgeries, rather than simply adding it to the list of services already funded under Medicaid and similar programs.

The right-leaning website OneNewsNow published an article with a misleading headline, reporting that Warren launched a fight to have taxpayer dollars fund "gender-affirming healthcare" and "free" sex-changing surgery, based on her social media posts and support for a campaign criticizing the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services' move to repeal a rule protecting trans individuals from discrimination.
